introduction.subtitle: About Nimetex Groupe
introduction.title: YOUR OFFSHORE TEXTILE PARTNER
introduction.description: Nimetex Groupe is a leading Tunisian textile company with over 23 years of experience. We specialize in producing quality garments for the luxury market, offering comprehensive services from design to mass production. Our expertise covers pattern making, screen printing, fabric sourcing and collection management for prestigious brands.

packaging.subtitle: Our Solutions
packaging.title: Packaging Solutions
packaging.description: Comprehensive packaging solutions designed for sustainability and brand impact
packaging.heroDescription: Comprehensive packaging solutions including paper packaging, textile packaging, protective cases, jewelry & watch packaging, and e-commerce packaging designed for sustainability and brand impact. We specialize in creating eco-friendly packaging that protects your products while enhancing your brand presence in the market.

definitionSection.title: What is Sustainable Packaging?
definitionSection.description1: Sustainable packaging solutions that minimize environmental impact while maintaining product protection and brand appeal. Our comprehensive approach covers everything from material selection to end-of-life considerations.
definitionSection.description2: We work with global brands to develop packaging strategies that align with sustainability goals, reduce waste, and enhance brand value through innovative design and eco-friendly materials.
definitionSection.description3: From paper packaging and textile solutions to protective cases and e-commerce packaging, we provide end-to-end packaging solutions that meet both functional and environmental requirements.

showcase.title: Our Packaging Solutions
showcase.description: Discover our complete range of sustainable packaging solutions designed to enhance your brand and protect your products.

socialLegislation.title: Social Legislation
socialLegislation.description: Strict compliance with current social standards

certifications.certificationDescription1: We select our commercial partners based on their ethical commitment, thus sharing our vision of responsible production.
certifications.certificationDescription2: SA8000 is a demanding code of conduct that places social aspects at the heart of sustainable development, and we are committed to respecting it rigorously.
certifications.certificationDescription3: By choosing NIMETEX GROUPE, our clients can be assured that their products are manufactured in compliance with the strictest ethical and social standards, while preserving the rights and dignity of every worker.
certifications.certificationQuote: We are happy to promote an ethical and productive line, in harmony with our commitment to society.

hero.title: About
hero.description: Nimetex Groupe is a leader in sustainable packaging and visual merchandising solutions. We help companies transition to more environmentally friendly practices while optimizing their in-store presence and commercial impact.

whoWeAre.title: Who Are We?
whoWeAre.description:
Nimetex Groupe is a leading Tunisian textile company with over 23 years of experience. Based in Monastir, we specialize in producing quality garments for the luxury market.

Our expertise covers collection design, pattern making, screen printing, fabric sourcing and complete textile production chain management. We are committed to providing comprehensive services from design to mass production for prestigious brands.

clients.title: Who Do We Serve?
clients.description:
For nearly 10 years, we have been supporting startups, SMEs, multinationals, and NGOs in their efforts to enhance their products or services, evolve their brand image, and generate additional revenue.

Thanks to our experts in retail, digital, customer relations, and communication, we act at every stage of a product or service lifecycle to create value by proposing innovative levers and solutions.

innovation.name: Sustainable Innovation
innovation.description: We develop packaging and merchandising solutions that respect the environment while optimizing commercial impact. Our eco-responsible approach ensures sustainable results.

excellence.name: Operational Excellence
excellence.description: Our technical expertise and global partner network enable us to deliver high-quality solutions with optimized timelines and exceptional customer service.

partnership.name: Client Partnership
partnership.description: We engage in long-term partnership relationships with our clients, understanding their specific challenges and proposing solutions adapted to their needs.

custom.name: Customized Solutions
custom.description: Every project is unique. We create tailor-made solutions that perfectly adapt to your brand, products, and specific commercial objectives.

manufacturing.title: Manufacturing Services
manufacturing.subtitle: Our Manufacturing
manufacturing.heroDescription: Industrial production with modern equipment and advanced techniques. We offer comprehensive manufacturing services including automatic production, screen printing, embroidery, heat transfer, and specialized washing processes.

definitionSection.title: What is Advanced Manufacturing?
definitionSection.description1: Our manufacturing facility combines traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology to produce high-quality textile products. We utilize automated systems, precision equipment, and skilled artisans to ensure excellence in every product.
definitionSection.description2: From concept to completion, our manufacturing process is designed for efficiency, quality, and sustainability. We work with luxury brands and fashion companies to bring their visions to life through superior production capabilities.
definitionSection.description3: Our facility includes specialized equipment for screen printing, embroidery, heat transfer, and various finishing techniques. Every step is carefully monitored to maintain the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.

showcase.title: Our Manufacturing Capabilities
showcase.description: Explore our comprehensive manufacturing services designed to meet the demands of modern textile production.

automation.name: Automated Manufacturing
automation.description: State-of-the-art automated systems for efficient and precise production

screenPrinting.description: High-quality screen printing services for textiles and garments

embroidery.name: Embroidery Services
embroidery.description: Precision embroidery work for luxury finishes and branding

heatTransfer.name: Heat Transfer
heatTransfer.description: Advanced heat transfer techniques for durable and vibrant designs

washing.name: Specialized Washing
washing.description: Professional washing and finishing processes for optimal results

qualityControl.name: Quality Control
qualityControl.description: Rigorous quality control measures throughout the production process

development.title: Development Services
development.subtitle: Our Development
development.heroDescription: Sourcing and development of custom textile solutions. We provide comprehensive development services including sourcing, raw materials procurement, custom creation, prototyping, and design consultation.

definitionSection.title: What is Textile Development?
definitionSection.description1: Our development services encompass the entire lifecycle of textile product creation, from initial concept to final production. We work closely with clients to understand their vision and transform it into tangible, high-quality products.
definitionSection.description2: We specialize in sourcing the finest materials and developing innovative textile solutions that meet specific requirements. Our team of experts handles everything from fabric selection to pattern development and prototyping.
definitionSection.description3: Our development process includes comprehensive market research, material testing, and iterative design refinement to ensure the final product exceeds expectations while maintaining cost-effectiveness and sustainability.

showcase.title: Our Development Services
showcase.description: Discover our comprehensive development capabilities that bring your textile ideas to life.

sourcing.name: Global Sourcing
sourcing.description: Worldwide sourcing of premium materials and components

rawMaterials.name: Raw Materials
rawMaterials.description: High-quality raw materials selection and procurement

customCreation.name: Custom Creation
customCreation.description: Bespoke textile solutions tailored to your specifications

prototyping.name: Prototyping
prototyping.description: Rapid prototyping services for testing and validation

patternMaking.name: Pattern Making
patternMaking.description: Expert pattern making and technical design services

designConsultation.name: Design Consultation
designConsultation.description: Professional design consultation and creative direction

logistics.title: Logistics Services
logistics.subtitle: Our Logistics
logistics.heroDescription: Complete logistics services for your exports with inventory management, international transport, and real-time order tracking. We ensure seamless delivery from our facility to your destination worldwide.

definitionSection.title: What is Global Logistics?
definitionSection.description1: Our logistics network spans the globe, providing seamless transportation and distribution services for textile products. We handle everything from warehousing to final delivery, ensuring your products reach their destination safely and on time.
definitionSection.description2: We leverage advanced technology and strategic partnerships to optimize shipping routes, reduce costs, and minimize transit times. Our team manages customs clearance, documentation, and compliance to ensure smooth international operations.
definitionSection.description3: From small boutique orders to large-scale retail distributions, our flexible logistics solutions adapt to your specific needs while maintaining the highest standards of service and reliability.

showcase.title: Our Logistics Solutions
showcase.description: Explore our comprehensive logistics services designed to streamline your supply chain operations.

warehouseManagement.name: Warehouse Management
warehouseManagement.description: Professional warehouse management and inventory control systems

internationalShipping.name: International Shipping
internationalShipping.description: Global shipping solutions with competitive rates and reliable service

orderTracking.name: Real-time Tracking
orderTracking.description: Advanced tracking systems for complete shipment visibility

inventoryManagement.name: Inventory Management
inventoryManagement.description: Comprehensive inventory management and stock optimization

customsClearance.name: Customs Clearance
customsClearance.description: Expert customs clearance and documentation services

deliveryOptimization.name: Delivery Optimization
deliveryOptimization.description: Optimized delivery routes and scheduling for maximum efficiency

specializedProducts.title: Specialized Products
specializedProducts.subtitle: Our Specializations
specializedProducts.heroDescription: Specialized and technical products according to your specifications. We create handmade items, sports equipment, medical textiles, technical fabrics, and safety products tailored to meet specific industry requirements.

definitionSection.title: What are Specialized Products?
definitionSection.description1: Our specialized products division focuses on creating high-performance textiles for specific industries and applications. We combine traditional craftsmanship with technical innovation to produce products that meet the most demanding requirements.
definitionSection.description2: From medical-grade textiles to technical safety equipment, our specialized products are manufactured to exceed industry standards. We work closely with regulatory bodies and certification organizations to ensure compliance and quality.
definitionSection.description3: Each specialized product is carefully designed and tested to ensure optimal performance in its intended application. Our expertise spans multiple industries, allowing us to provide innovative solutions for diverse market needs.

showcase.title: Our Specialized Categories
showcase.description: Discover our range of specialized products designed for specific industries and applications.

handmade.description: Artisanal handmade textiles and accessories with traditional craftsmanship
